Company background:

IPDEVCO provides comprehensive solutions for the on-line gaming industry and Internet based electronic cash management. The company has developed an integrated suite of applications consisting of solutions for the player and back office operations based on JAVA and C++ technology. Its client base consists of domestic and international clients.

Business initiative:

IPDevco continually develops new client functionality for its application suite. IPDevco requires additional Full-Time C++ Developer to join the team. The incumbent will be responsible for developing new C++ components and re-engineering new components from existing code that can be used by application developers. This is a senior position that requires extensive knowledge of multi-threaded applications, event handling, and component development.

Required skills:

5 ?8 years experience in C++ using Visual C++ 6.0, MFC

Experience in building Object Oriented components in C++, Active X, COM

Microsoft Visual Studio with C++, SourceSafe, InstallShield

Windows 32 Bit platforms: 95/98/NT/2000/ME

Effective communication skills

Excellent team player

Nice to have:

Knowledge of 2D/3D graphics animation and sound support

Game Development experience

Java exposure

Re-factoring experience

We thank you for your interest but must advice that only candidates to be interviewed will be contacted.



Additional Information
Position Type: Full Time, Permanent
